notesStmt.note: Based on the twelfth-century Anglo-Norman chanson de geste "Beuve de Hanstone".
Thirty-two lines to a page; 95 mm. textura with capital "T" having crooked stem. Begins on leaf 2 recto; line 1 there reads: In all the londes of crystyente--STC.
Imperfect; a fragment of two leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
